Only method that I could find that still used "SQL" instead of "Sql":
```
org.apache.beam.dsls.sql.schema.BeamTableUtils.beamSQLRow2CsvLine
```

I also noticed that "CSV" was used instead of "Csv" but this could be fixed at another time.

Run Apex ValidatesRunner
Run Gearpump ValidatesRunner
Run Flink ValidatesRunner

@reuvenlax this is currently blocked by [this refactor](https://github.com/apache/beam/pull/2282) requested by @peihe . If it is now possible to create pipelines with options like ignoreUnknownValues, then it's not necessary. Otherwise, I'm happy to find time to bring it up to date with the latest code, so long as I can get timely feedback.

This looks very good now! 👍 I'm merging.

@JingsongLi Do you want to look into porting the other state internals tests to the new base class as a follow-up?
Ah, @kennknowles are you also happy with the changes?

@jkff I implemented what you suggested: dealing directly with `PCollection<Message>` and providing the corresponding `Coder`.
NB: sorry, I squashed my changes by mistake.
